subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: More than any coaches remaining in the tournament, Louisville’s Rick Pitino and Kentucky’s John Calipari represent everything that makes big-time college coaching so convoluted and challenging.
snippet: More than any coaches remaining in the tournament, Louisville’s Rick Pitino and Kentucky’s John Calipari represent everything that makes big-time college coaching so convoluted and challenging.
